name: Blameless
description:
Blameless is a 3D adventure focused on puzzle solving and story. Set in an unfinished house, the player is trying to escape a mysterious man. While you know how and why you got there, you could not foresee you were invited for a twisted purpose and it’s upto you to investigate what happened and how to get out.

This is a short, yet full title with an open ending. Take around 20 to 60 minutes to complete.Blameless is freeBlameless is dedicated to the community!Gameplay FeaturesRealistic puzzle solving
Investigative approach
Mysterious atmosphere
Alternative puzzle solutions
Story progression via exploration
Character voice over
Element of tension
